title.narrative: Pakistan: Third Partnership for Polio Eradication Project

description.narrative: The project will assist the Government of Pakistan's Polio Eradication Initiative in decreasing the number of polio cases and ultimately eradicating the disease in Pakistan. The development objective is to assist Pakistan's efforts to eradicate polio through supply of the Oral Polio Vaccine for the country's supplementary immunization activities during 2009-11.

participating-org.narrative: 2009: Expanded Program on Immunization, Ministry of Health
2011: Expanded Program on Immunization, Ministry of Interprovincial Coordination
2013: Expanded Prog on Immunization, Min. of National Health Services, Regulation and Coordination

condition.narrative: Maintain Inter-Agency Coordination Committee, provincial and district coordination committees at national, provincial and districtl evel for coordination of OPV supply execution of PEI activities
New OPV Procurement Agreement, consistent with Program Implementation Plan, executed and delivered by the GOP and UNICEF, andeffective
OPV procurement agreement executed between the government and UNICEF
OPV procurement agreement has been executed and delivered by the recipient and UNICEF
Reciepient shall revise its PEI strategy based on findings of Independent Assessment by WHO
The disease surveillance systems established under PEI will be maintained, all throughout the period of Project implementation
carry out an OPV management review under terms of reference satisfactory to the Association;
prepare a detailed plan, in a manner and substances satisfactory to the Association, extending the OPV inventory managementsystemsto provincial and district level.

title.narrative: OPV coverage is at least 90% in the targeted accessible populations in all high risk districts

comment.narrative: average for rounds held from June 2013 to Jan 2014 (range 90 - 97)

title.narrative: Timely arrival of OPV in district stores

comment.narrative: in 117 out of 132 districts vaccines arrived 3 days prior to NID
